TopicTitle: having issues loading KSP not sure which mod is responsible

Articles.Content:
my mod list is as follows

Spaceplane Plus v1.1

TV_Aerospace v1.6.4

B9 Aerospace 6/18

infernal robotics .16

Sensible Pumps 6/13

Active Texture Management 3.1

FloorItPro 6/8

Kerbal Joint Reinforcement v2.3

ProcFairings v3.05

KerbalAlarmClock v2.7.4.0

Fusebox v0.99

SCANSat for All 5/30

RCSBuildAid v0.4.6

Engineer v0.6.2.4

HotRockets v7.1

AutoAsparagus v0.4

Docking Port Alignment Indicator v3.1

MeckJeb2 v2.2.1.0

RemoteTeck v1.4.0

Interstellar v0.11

ModuleManager v.2.1.5

Ferram Aerospace Research v0.13.3

EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements v7-3

SCANsat v6.0

Deadly Reentry Continued v4.7

Real Fuels v6.1

KAS v0.4.7

RealChute v1.1.0.1

AJE v1.4

Toolbar v1.7.1

Procedural Wing v0.7

the game was just re-installed because I was having issues, and I deleted the NASA pack. The current issue is that the loading bar freezes during initial startup on a specific B9 part (a sabre engine) I have had this issue previously with a different mod and deleting that mod did not fix the issue, it just froze on a different mod. I am running on mac OSX if it matters. all mods are the latest version as I just re-downloaded them all tonight.

Edit: the game isn't officially freezing, and the loading hints keep rolling, but the loading bar just stops moving and it stops loading anything, the exact part is

B9_Aerospace/Parts/Engine_SABRE_Myy/part/B9_Engine_SABRE_M, and I am using the Repaired B9 version that can be found on curseforge

Edited June 19, 2014 by jab136

Based on what you've described, it seems that the problem lies with the B9 (or more specifically, the SABRE M).

Can you try temporarily removing the SABRE M config from the B9 folder, and see if the game loads properly?

It may also be an issue with the repaired B9 version of CurseForge possibly having an improperly-formatted CFG / patch.

also module manager is saying 763 patches applied 4 hidden items where it has always said # patches applied 0 errors

I also tried the repack that was posted on curseforge instead of repaired B9 but it is still having the same issue

I just deleted the SABRE M from the game and it proceeded to freeze on the SABRE S, when I deleted that it froze on the RAPIER engine in the base game

Edited June 19, 2014 by jab136
Open output_log.txt and see if there is an error or exception there. Also, what sumghai said, try removing the offending part.

Open output_log.txt and see if there is an error or exception there. Also, what sumghai said, try removing the offending part.

thanks for the tip, it turns out that the game was looking for hydrogen as a fuel, and I didn't have real fuels installed so I installed real fuels and now the game loads
